data.title: Critically Low Flows Prompt Emergency Curtailment Orders for Scott, Shasta Rivers
data.excerpt: With record low flows in the Scott and Shasta Rivers threatening the survival of multiple fish species, the State Water Resources Control Board ordered right holders to stop diverting water to ensure supplies for human health and livestock needs and to protect fish.
data.author: Chach Sikes
